mapper.insert: INSERT INTO linkage_event (alarm_id, linkage_type, target, payload, status, last_error, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{alarmId}, #{linkageType}, #{target}, #{payload}, #{status}, #{lastError}, NOW(3), NOW(3))
mapper.select: SELECT id, alarm_id, linkage_type, target, payload, status, last_error, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(created_at) * 1000 AS created_at, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(updated_at) * 1000 AS updated_at FROM linkage_event WHERE status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE linkage_event SET status = 'SENT', updated_at = NOW(3) WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE linkage_event SET status = 'FAILED', last_error = #{lastError}, updated_at = NOW(3) WHERE id = #{id}
